fields.title: 2FA Enforced on Organization
fields.description: Checks if Two-Factor Authentication is required for all members.

fields.title: Main Branch Protection
fields.description: Ensures the main/master branch has protection rules enabled.

fields.title: AWS Root Account MFA
fields.description: Verifies that the root account has MFA enabled.

fields.title: S3 Buckets Public Access
fields.description: Checks for S3 buckets that are open to the public internet.

fields.title: Unused IAM Users
fields.description: Flags IAM users who haven't logged in for 90 days.

fields.title: Open SSH Port (22)
fields.description: Checks for Security Groups allowing 0.0.0.0/0 on port 22.

fields.title: CloudTrail Logging Enabled
fields.description: Verifies that CloudTrail is active in all regions.

fields.title: HTTPS Enforced
fields.description: Checks if load balancers redirect HTTP to HTTPS.

fields.title: Admin Access MFA
fields.description: Ensures admin panels are behind MFA.
